text: Associazione Sportiva Dilettantistica Victor San Marino, better known as Victor San Marino (and formerly San Marino Calcio), is a Sammarinese professional association football club based in the city of Serravalle, that competed in the Eccellenza. It was founded in 1959 and re-founded in 1973 and again in 2000, it was the only football club based in the Republic of San Marino authorized by the FIGC to compete in the Italian football league ==References== Category:1959 establishments in Europe Category:European football clubs Category:Sport in San Marino Category:Organizations based in San Marino Category:Italian football clubs
title: ASD Victor San Marino
